channel.title: bm_c1a4b.bsp 6107kb
channel.description:
Hello, I need some help.
I'm at the end of bm_c1a4a, this elevator gets me to another map (there is a loading screen) but it freezes when it´s loading, no crash, no logs no nothing.
I located the file and it´s called bm_c1a4b.bsp, the weird thing is its size, only 6mb.
Could you make me a favor and upload this map?. (I deleted the intaller)
Thank you very much. (sorry for my english)
![](upload://d24Oc6QxfToMpWZWlu68PJFKYW3.jpeg)
